title: Where are all the T205's ?  WTB
author: familytoad

posts.post_title: Where are all the T205's ?  WTB
posts.post_content:
I'm excited to see all the buzz about the best baseball card set of all-time (no not 1987 Topps;)) 

T205!

It's caused me to go through my set and look at the backs, read the bios (try that on T206;))
Ok, I even started logging the factory designations on my spreadsheet.

But the real point of this post is to acquire some more of these. I have one full set, but I need upgrades, a second set and/or even rarer backs someday, so why not start now...
I ONLY want SGC graded cards, looking for grades 30-60 for now, although I would consider higher or lower if the price is right...or if the back is an upgrade to what I have already.
I'll begin the begging looking for the commons I'd like to upgrade...all listed below. Send me what you have for sale, and we'll try to come up with something.

Archer
Austin
Bergen
Corridon
Engle
Ewing
Flynn
Gardner
Hauser
Jacklitsch
LaPorte
Leach
Maddox
Magee
McBride
Meyers
Murray
Overall
Paskert
Phelps
Schmidt
Simmons
Steinfeldt

I have the following T205 available.  Let me know if you are interested in any.  Bill

BatesSGC 50Sovereign
DoyleSGC 50Hassan
FergusonSGC 40Polar Bear
FoxenSGC 40Polar Bear
GoodeSGC 40Honest Long Cut
LeachSGC 40Piedmont
SheckardSGC 50Piedmont
StahlSGC 50Sweet Caporal
TitusSGC 40Piedmont

I agree with Brian...but I only like non-graded p-f-g cards with completely readable backs. I love the rough, dirty, creased cards. Bring them on! 

Joshua

[quote name="oldphil" post=1054699]PM sent[/QUOTE]

You really need to quit posting so often :D.
Your hint is well taken. I'll work on it.

Aw, another post won't hurt Mike...especially if it is about T205!!

Your list of cards you offered look great...but none of them is on the list of cards I'm looking for...with one exception, the Hick Cady card could be an upgrade for me. Mine isn't slabbed yet and when it gets graded, it might be lower than the one you offered...can you send a scan so I can compare? If it looks nice, we can likely swing a deal!

familytoad at comcast dot net is my email address...Thanks for writing Mike!!!!
